skins.shipDescription: Ranger-class aircraft carrier ©` Ranger, Hull Number CV-4!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Ranger, the first purpose-built aircraft carrier of the Eagle Union. During my service in the Atlantic, I was part of various missions functioning as the largest carrier in the area. While I'm a carrier... please don't have weird expectations of me! For your sake, I don't want to disappoint you!
skins.acquisition: I'm the Eagle Union's first purpose-built carrier, Ranger! I was stationed in the Atlantic, where I mainly served as an escort to convoys and aircraft carriers. Specialty teaching? T-that's not what I was sent here for, b-but¡­ if you insist¡­ --I can do it...
skins.login: Can I conduct combat operations since the weather is so nice today, Commander?
skins.details: D-don't look at me inappropriatly! And do your work properly! --Y-Y-You were just looking at my bridge?! ...Ahaha...
skins.secretaryIdle1: What I teach besides fighting is human se... I-I mean... physical education!
skins.secretaryIdle2: The Sakura Empire? ...Uh, Uhhh... I- I don't know enough to teach you about that!
skins.secretaryIdle3: If you don't listen to what I say, I'll punish you!
skins.secretaryTouch: Hwaa!? Commander... S...Stop... is what you want me to say?!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: D-don't tell anyone about this! You'll embarrass me!

skins.shipDescription: I didn't realize I could still become more powerful! I'll work harder from here on out to teach everyone how to fight!
skins.acquisition: The modernization that had never happened has finally been completed! From now on, I, Ms. Ranger, will continue to teach as well~
skins.login: This child seems fine... This one is recovering well... Ah, welcome back, Commander!
skins.details: C-Commander?! I-I-Is my bridge, really that beautiful?
skins.secretaryIdle1: A weapon may be powerful, but if it can't be used properly, it won't be completely effective. It is the teacher's job to teach you how to use them! Physical education? I-I'll teach that again!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I've only improved a few times before, and they were just small enhancements. Now that everyone is stronger, I can start getting some work done.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander? I believe in you, so I'm letting you study on your own while I work on my planes. I'll get angry if you avoid your study this time, alright?
skins.secretaryTouch: Yeah yeah, Commander is totally not good without a Teacher here... Yup, can't help it~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, can you help a teacher out here a little?... Eeek! ....Really?...
